name: Chemical engineering and processes
description: Within Engineering, Manufacturing and Construction / Engineering and engineering trades, this field is the study of planning, designing, and developing products and processes where chemical and physical changes occur. It includes designing chemical plants and control systems.

name: Chemical engineering
description: The branch of engineering that deals with chemical production and the manufacture of products through chemical processes.

name: Chemical process engineering
description: Focuses on the design, operation, control, and optimization of chemical processes.

name: Laboratory technology
description: The study and application of techniques and equipment used in scientific laboratories, particularly relevant here if the emphasis is not on a specific application like biology or medicine, but on general chemical processes.

name: Oil/gas/petrochemicals processing
description: The study of processes involved in refining crude oil, processing natural gas, and producing petrochemicals.

name: Plant and machine operation (processing)
description: Skills and knowledge related to operating machinery and equipment in chemical processing plants.

name: Process technology
description: The study of the principles and practices involved in industrial processes, particularly in the chemical and manufacturing sectors.
